faq.sectionTitle: Everything you need before launching the mission.
faq.sectionDescription: Need something else? Drop me a WhatsApp voice note and we solve it on the spot.

items.question: What do I need to kick off in under 24h?
items.answer: Temporary admin, analytics, and site access plus clear goals (sales, leads, stability). With that I prep the work map and confirm delivery window.

items.question: Does it include implementation or just recommendations?
items.answer: Every package includes fixes within scope. If something bigger appears, I quote an express add-on with precise hours—no surprises.

items.question: How do you validate conversion lift?
items.answer: I activate dashboards with key event comparisons, define KPIs, and hand over scripts for A/B tests. I also follow up for 7 days and fine-tune if needed.
